topic.title: ZeroNet Boiler Site
topic.body:
#This is for people who wish to create a ZeroNet website

I created this a while ago and just refreshed it with a README.

I thought I'd share it here hopefully someone will benefit from it.


https://github.com/AshotN/ZeroNet-Boiler

If you have any questions feel free to PM me or just comment on this thread.
